page.title: 15TOURISTS ENJOY SEASIDE
page.content:
Monifieth is a good holiday centre As the main Dundee-Arbroath-Aberdeen Road runs just north of the town,there is easy access to other places. The Caravan Site is popular specially in July when during the 4week period a 1000 or more people may be staying. Families with young children find lots to do-putting,go-karting and making sandcastles.Beach leaders have a games programme. Older people enjoy quietness and the pleasant seaside atmosphere.They like the friendly assistants in the shops.
Ardestie Earth House is worth a visit Leave your car by the road and walk up to the Souterrain,a longcurved passage mostly underground,thatched-roofed.It may have been used as refuge or stores The settlement,4 stone huts thatched- roofed was occupied AD 1st-2nd century
